message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. That's the highest I can go.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest. While $100 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. That's the best I can do.
